attributes.action: To Ban Greenwich Meantime and have British Summertime All Year Round
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain tried this in 1968 to 1971 and we will be in line with the rest of Europe. It will save on Electricty in the Winter and prevent Global Warming

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
